    const LazySet = require("./LazySet");
    
    /** @type {LazySet} */
    const stringSet = undefined;
    stringSet.addAll(stringSet);

     * @typedef {Object} SomeObject
     */
    class LazySet {
        /**
         * @param {LazySet} iterable
         */
        addAll(iterable) {}
        [Symbol.iterator]() {}
    }
